articles.content: Chelsea became record-breakers at Aston Villa on Wednesday night when they extended their unbeaten run in the Womens Super League to 32 games. Two years to the day from their last WSL defeat, Emma Ha… [+2157 chars]

articles.title: Conor McGregor cops embarrassing new blow after KO loss - Yahoo Sport Australia
articles.description: The full fallout from Conor McGregor's loss at UFC 257 is now being realised.
articles.content:
